post:
To start the new year off with a bang, we have increased the allocations of Memory, Disk space and Bandwidth on our VPS packages.

With fully Managed VPS Accounts, all you have to worry about is your own business, and leave the server and server problems to us!

For a limited time, take an additional 10% off (each month) with the hosting coupon HDNEWYEAR. Supplies are limited at this discounted rate, so act quickly!

Remember, these are FULLY MANAGED VPS servers!
